tool_description: Get historical values for NSE Market Turnover API
name: NSE Market Turnover
title: NSE Market Turnover

api_list.name: Get Open Interest
api_list.description: Gets closing NSE open interest data for the given date
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://nse-market-turnover.p.rapidapi.com/marketTurnover/2023-01-01"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nse-market-turnover.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://nse-market-turnover.p.rapidapi.com/marketTurnover/{date}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nse-market-turnover.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
